Aurora.Modules.Terrain.FileLoaders.GenericSystemDrawing Class Reference

A virtual class designed to have methods overloaded, this class provides an interface for a generic image saving and loading mechanism, but does not specify the format. It should not be insubstantiated directly. More...

Inheritance diagram for Aurora.Modules.Terrain.FileLoaders.GenericSystemDrawing:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual ITerrainChannel LoadFile (string filename, IScene scene)
 Loads a file from a specified filename on the disk, parses the image using the System.Drawing parsers then returns a terrain channel. Values are returned based on HSL brightness between 0m and 128m.

Properties

string FileExtension [get]

Detailed Description

A virtual class designed to have methods overloaded, this class provides an interface for a generic image saving and loading mechanism, but does not specify the format. It should not be insubstantiated directly.

Member Function Documentation

static Bitmap Aurora.Modules.Terrain.FileLoaders.GenericSystemDrawing.CreateBitmapFromMap ( ITerrainChannel  map  )  [static, protected]

Protected method, generates a coloured bitmap image from a specified terrain channel.

Returns:
A System.Drawing.Bitmap containing a coloured image

virtual ITerrainChannel Aurora.Modules.Terrain.FileLoaders.GenericSystemDrawing.LoadFile ( string  filename,
IScene  scene 
) [virtual]

Loads a file from a specified filename on the disk, parses the image using the System.Drawing parsers then returns a terrain channel. Values are returned based on HSL brightness between 0m and 128m.

Parameters:
filename The target image to load
Returns:
A terrain channel generated from the image.
